column2: Over half of Boeing's fighter-jet plant machinists opt for voluntary buyouts Sept 12 More than half of the Boeing Co  machinists at its fighter-jet plant in St. Louis
column4: have signed up to take voluntary buyouts
column5: the International Association of Machinists and Aerospace Workers said on Friday. ~

column2: Alabama court lets class action lawsuit against CVS Health proceed BIRMINGHAM
column4: Sept 12 The Alabama Supreme Court on Friday allowed a class action lawsuit seeking more than $3 billion to go forward against CVS Health Corp and several insurance companies
column5: affirming the ruling by a lower court which said the plaintiffs could be certified as a class. ~

column2: Workers at Lear plant in Indiana go on strike
column3: could affect Ford -Chicago Tribune Sept 13 Workers at a Lear Corp plant in Indiana that makes parts for Ford Motor Co went on strike Saturday
